__e: Sir Guy and the sheriff are watering their horses.
You told me you and Guy were good friends for a long time.
Guy and I are both very unhappy that he got his break because of your misfortune.
They probably made some deal with Guy.
This is the castle of my master, Guy de Loimbard.
Don't you see that one word from him would get Guy out of this dreadful situation?
And it just so happens Sir Guy of Gisbourne has decreed Maid Marian's head shall come off tomorrow at noon.
It feels like Guy's been gone for years.
Guy left two months ago, and he's only written once.
To him, Guy is a perfectly healthy man... but that isn't true... and you must do something to help him, Miles.
